documents.document: Hey Vancouver friends. anyone have tix to the March Canucks Bruins game they wanna sell?

@emmaruthnum you should put a mini fridge right there i think!
@TonyBaroni13 you just need a beer sponsorship i think.

@FrankieKazarian dude theres nothing worse than when a band i like tries to get all artsy and different.
This kid is stoked!!!! https://t.co/vI2ewDZowX
Got my haircut in Spain. I was looking haggard. Over 30 and playing in a pop punk band demands i look handsome! https://t.co/6k7PWQPzJz
@TravisReilly is this the record that @RickisHell sings Talk is Cheap, Respect is earned? Been my wrestling slogan since 2008!
@alCorte_zgz thanks for a great dinner tonight! Best Jamon in Spain!!! Xoxo

Every bar in Spain plays Fugazi. What the fucks up with that?
@CarlyyWho Thanks. Hope to see you at a show soon!

Off to Spain and Portugal for 2 weeks. Stoked. See you all at @ASWCANADA Jan 28th
@axlrose Axl, i have a portrait of you tattooed on my shoulder. Can you sign it when your in Vancouver so I can get it tattooed?

Listened to this at the gym today. Bobby is a sweet dude. Learn more about him and give this a listen! https://t.co/QFCIrOquiJ
Hey wrestling promoters.. I need to fill my Feb and March dates. Also i will be in Eastern Canada at the end of May. Sweet..thanks!
@afrojay Daggermouth is back now..so dont cry
@airfrance Hey, why is the flight from YVR to France tomorrow cancelled? Now my holidays are screwed.
